body_html:
No, I'm opposed to BasicLSTMCell having layer norm in the first place. Let's fix that in the other PR and then we don't need this one.

body:
No, I'm opposed to BasicLSTMCell having layer norm in the first place.
Let's fix that in the other PR and then we don't need this one.

On Fri, May 19, 2017 at 12:13 PM, Rasmus Munk Larsen <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @tensorflow-jenkins <https://github.com/tensorflow-jenkins> test this
> please
